domhandler

The DOM handler (formally known as DefaultHandler) creates a tree containing all nodes of a page. The tree may be manipulated using the domutils library.

Usage

javascript var handler = new DomHandler([ callback(err, dom), ] [ options ]); // var parser = new Parser(handler[, options]);

Available options are described below.

Example

javascript var htmlparser = require("htmlparser2"); var rawHtml = "Xyz
